A Healthy You for Dear Darrell Its a new year and a time when many people are resolving to finally do all those things that theyve been putting off Making resolutions is one thing but keeping them is another Were here to help Did you resolve to EAT HEALTHY GET FIT STOP SMOKING ORGANIZE YOUR HEALTH CARE Update Your Health History Print Your Prescription Records At Home You can do it Get started here with ideas and tips from Mayo Clinic Health Information And get the products you need from Walgreenscom to help keep your resolution for years to come And remember order just or more from our Store Online and get FREE STANDARD SHIPPING Minimum purchase amount shall not include prescriptions sales tax or shipping charges EATING HEALTHY tips from Mayo Clinic Health Information Trying to lose weight have more energy eat delicious foods and have more variety in your diet this year We can help you eat well every day with these diet and nutrition tips from Mayo Clinic Health Information EATING WELL MEANS ENJOYING VARIETY Trying to eat well but tired of having the same foods over and over Try planning meals around small portions of a variety of foods Following recommended serving sizes makes it easy to enjoy variety while maintaining a healthy weight Read more librarylifestylenutritionfeaturefeatjhtmlectn GOOD AND BAD FATS Trying to lose weight and watching your fat intake In terms of health effects not all fats are alike Sort out the good from the bad with this helpful guide Read more librarylifestylenutritionfeaturefeatjhtmlectn FOODS THAT FIGHT CANCER Did you know that some foods may help reduce your risk of cancer Substances in soy for example may cause changes at the cellular level that hinder cancer cell development and growth Read more librarylifestylenutritiondietdietjhtmlectn NUTRITION CENTER A great resource for good nutrition Featuring uptodate articles recipes expert answers and more Read more FREE SHIPPING ON PEDLAR The PEDLAR LIGHT WORKOUT EXERCISER is a safe way to improve circulation and strengthen muscles The Pedlar Exerciser can be used while seated in a chair from the side of a bed or while sitting in a wheelchair Reg Sale Priced ecchtmectn For a limited time get FREE SHIPPING when you order the PEDLAR LIGHT WORKOUT EXERCISER SHOP OUR WIDE SELECTION OF FITNESS PRODUCTS ecdhtmectn Remember it is always a good idea to talk with your doctor before beginning any exercise program STOP SMOKING tips from Mayo Clinic Health Information If you smoke chances are youve thought about quitting You may even think about it every New Years Eve This year dont just think quit Get smoke free for and beyond MANY OPTIONS TO HELP YOU QUIT Only about percent of smokers are able to quit without some form of help A variety of prescription and nonprescription options are available to help you quit smoking Read more librarystopsmokingoptionsjhtmlectn WONT I GAIN WEIGHT IF I STOP SMOKING There are several common questions that people who are trying to quit smoking have If youre a smoker the questions probably wont surprise you as youve probably had them yourself The answers however might not only surprise you but may also help you quit librarystopsmokingweightgainjhtmlectn DONT SMOKE JUMP ROPE Many experts in smoking cessation believe exercise significantly aids efforts to stop smoking Learn more about the benefits of exercise and find the right exercise program for the new nonsmoking you Read more librarystopsmokingjumpropejhtmlectn STOP SMOKING CENTRAL With our complete selection of smoking cessation products and information youll be well on the way to kicking the habit today Read more librarystopsmokingdefaultjhtmlectn MAILIN REBATE ON WALGREENS NICOTINE TRANSDERMAL PATCHES Save on select Walgreens Nicotine Transdermal System Patches after mail in rebate Reg Price after mailin rebate ecehtmectn Get Rebate Details storerebatecluboverviewjhtmlectn SHOP OUR WIDE year Once you have entered your Personal Identification Number PIN this feature will update your personal health history to your existing Walgreens records the same records your Walgreens pharmacist uses Learn more here helphealthhistorydefaultjhtmlectn PRINT YOUR PRESCRIPTION RECORDS AT HOME Have a healthcare reimbursement account You may need a printout of your prescription records and your costs to receive your reimbursement At Walgreenscom you can view and print your prescription records from the comfort of your own home Get started here pharmacyreportrxprintjhtmlloginDSectn If you have not yet requested your PIN request one here pharmacyregisterrequestpinjhtmlloginDSectn Whatever your New Years resolutions you can keep them with a little help from your friends at Walgreenscom We hope you find Walgreenscom helpful in managing your everyday health care and drugstore needs If you have any questions or need assistance please contact us by email at or call us toll free at hours a day days a week Happy New Year The Walgreenscom Team This email was sent to Darrell at Your Walgreenscom registration indicates you would like to receive special information from Walgreens If you
